summary: Stuff started happening after i installed a lot of mods. So i started googling stuff. This Fixes some stuff.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever thought
~"Hmmm Why is Dynavision making everything blurry"
~"Why does my vampire waits a second after i pressed feed"
~"Why can't i place buildings properly when playing Tundra Defense"
~"Why is it when npc's finished talking the dialog box wont close and you have to press the [TAB] button"

Well guys i found this little fix that fixes our grudges.

Just simply put this in your [b]SKYRIM.INI[/b] file.
Anywhere, any order.

[Papyrus]
fUpdateBudgetMS=800
fExtraTaskletBudgetMS=800
fPostLoadUpdateTimeMS=2000
iMinMemoryPageSize=256
iMaxMemoryPageSize=512
iMaxAllocatedMemoryBytes=2457600


Viola Problem solved.
Found using google. Not My work. I do not claim this as my own.
author: Anon Google SkyrimCommunity
